prompts.name: Regulatory Compliance Consultation
prompts.description: This template assists in sketching a consultation to a client regarding their current regulatory compliance status. Replace {{client's industry}} with the specific area in which the client operates, {{relevant regulation}} with the regulation the client needs guidance on, and {{compliance strategies}} with strategic approaches to achieve compliance.
prompts.content: Offer a detailed compliance consultation to a client in the {{client's industry}}. Outline the essential aspects of {{relevant regulation}}, evaluate the potential impacts on the client's business and suggest practical {{compliance strategies}} to ensure their practices are aligned with the regulations. Ensure to maintain confidentiality of the client’s proprietary information.

prompts.name: Horizon Scanning Report
prompts.description: This template aids in formulating a horizon scanning report identifying potential future risks and opportunities. Replace {{relevant industry}} with the client's industry, {{potential regulatory changes}} with expected changes in regulatory landscape, and {{impact assessment}} with how these changes could affect the client's business.
prompts.content: Create a horizon scanning report concentrating on the {{relevant industry}}. The report should project potential {{potential regulatory changes}} and provide a detailed {{impact assessment}} on the client's operations. Please refrain from including unconfirmed or speculative information.

prompts.name: Compliance Testing and Assessment
prompts.description: Use this template to devise a comprehensive compliance testing or assessment plan. Substitute {{client's business sectors}} with the areas the client is operating in, {{compliance standards}} with the standards the test is based on, and {{testing and assessment measures}} with the methods or tools to be used for the test.
prompts.content: Draft a compliance testing and assessment protocol for key {{client's business sectors}} to ensure they align with {{compliance standards}}. Outline the {{testing and assessment measures}}, and define the steps made to correct and prevent non-compliant activities. Exclude any proprietary methodologies still in the developmental or decision phase.

prompts.name: Cyber Risk Assessment
prompts.description: This template helps in creating a cybersecurity risk assessment report. Replace {{client's IT infrastructure}} with the areas being assessed, {{identified risks}} with the potential cyber threats identified, {{risk mitigation strategies}} with the suggested strategies to manage the risks.
prompts.content: Develop a cyber risk assessment for {{client's IT infrastructure}}. The report should detail {{identified risks}} and propose corresponding {{risk mitigation strategies}}. It should also give an overview of the client's current cyber risk posture and provide recommendations for improvements. Ensure all information is accurate and up-to-date.

prompts.name: Risk Management Planning
prompts.description: Use this template to help in creating a comprehensive risk management plan. Replace {{identified business risks}} with the risks recognised, {{risk mitigation strategies}} with strategies to manage the identified risks, and {{contingency plans}} with alternative plans in case main strategies fail.
prompts.content: Construct a robust risk management plan. Include {{identified business risks}}, analyse their potential impact on business, and suggest {{risk mitigation strategies}}. It should also contain {{contingency plans}} for exceptional scenarios. Please ensure not to disclose any confidential or sensitive information.

prompts.name: Vendor Risk Management
prompts.description: This template aids in generating a vendor risk management plan. Substitute {{client's key vendors}} with crucial vendors, {{vendor risk factors}} with potential risks associated with these vendors, and {{risk management strategies}} with strategies to manage and mitigate these risks.
prompts.content: Prepare a vendor risk management plan highlighting {{client's key vendors}}. Identify {{vendor risk factors}} and propose effective {{risk management strategies}}. The management plan should provide the client with an informed view of how, why, and which vendors can deliver long-term value. Exclude any highly confidential client-vendor details.

prompts.name: Financial Crime Risk Management
prompts.description: Use this template to help in formulating a financial crime risk management plan. Replace {{client's financial operations}} with the areas that are susceptible to financial crime, {{potential crime scenarios}} with potential crime risks, and {{prevention measures}} with steps for prevention or risk management.
prompts.content: Devise a financial crime risk management plan. The plan should focus on {{client's financial operations}}, explore {{potential crime scenarios}} and outline detailed crime {{prevention measures}}. Keep the language simple and clear, focusing only on actionable and feasible measures.

prompts.name: Regulatory Inventory Report
prompts.description: This template can be used to create an enriched regulatory inventory report. Insert {{client's regulatory requirements}} for relevant regulations the client should abide by, and {{compliance status}} for each regulation’s compliance status of the client.
prompts.content: Create a comprehensive regulatory inventory report. It should include all of the {{client's regulatory requirements}} and the client’s {{compliance status}} for each regulation. Provide insights on potential compliance gaps and suggest improvements. Please keep confidential information secure.

prompts.name: Global Regulatory Insight Service
prompts.description: This template helps in formulating a detailed report on global regulatory developments. Replace {{relevant global regions}} with regions that could impact the client's operations, {{recent regulatory changes}} with recent changes in those regions, and {{impact on client's business}} with how these changes could impact the client's business.
prompts.content: Draft a report detailing global regulatory developments in {{relevant global regions}}. The report should highlight {{recent regulatory changes}} and analyse their {{impact on client's business}}. Avoid inclusion of speculative or unverified data.

prompts.name: Internal Audit Plan
prompts.description: This template can be used to sketch a comprehensive internal audit plan. Substitute {{client's business sectors}} with the areas the client operates in, {{key risk areas}} with the main areas where risk is anticipated, and {{audit measures}} with the methods or steps to be used for the audit.
prompts.content: Formulate an internal audit plan focussing on {{client's business sectors}}. Highlight {{key risk areas}} and suggest in-depth {{audit measures}} to assess the efficacy of controls in place. Exclude internal processes yet to be implemented or approved by the client.
